articles.title: Election of Deputies to SPA Starts in DPRK
articles.content:
Election of Deputies to SPA Starts in DPRK 
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The election of deputies to the 11th Supreme People's Assembly started today in the DPRK.
 All voters are participating as one in the election  with revolutionary zeal and consciousness of citizens.

articles.title: Large Mosaic Erected in Sinuiju
articles.content:
Large Mosaic Erected in Sinuiju 
    Sinuiju, August 2 (KCNA) -- A large mosaic "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" was erected in Sinuiju.
 The mosaic, 10 m in width and 11 m in height, depicts smiling President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea and father of the nation.    
 An unveiling ceremony took place on the spot on August 2.

Greetings to Macedonian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Macedonian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Branko Crvenkovski, Prime Minister of Macedonia, on the occasion of its National Day.
 Wishing the prime minister great success in his work for the economic development of the country, the message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would continue to develop in different fields.

articles.title: International Commodity Exhibition to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
International Commodity Exhibition to Be Held in Pyongyang
    Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The 6th Pyongyang International Commodity Exhibition will be held from August 11 to 14.
 The exhibition will bring together more than 100 companies of various countries and regions including the DPRK, China, Germany, Thailand and Malaysia.    
 The exhibition will provide an opportunity of strengthening the exchange of electronic goods, communication equipment, vehicles, facilities for poultry industry, machine tools, light industrial goods and articles for cultural use.

articles.title: S. Korean Teachers Union Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
S. Korean Teachers Union Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Teachers Union of South Korea led by its vice-chairman Jo Hui Ju left here on Saturday.
 That day the delegation visited the Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University and the Grand People's Study House.
